actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Mourning the loss of Vernon Hunter and honoring the service of Robin De Haven and the first responders to the attack on the Internal Revenue Service in Austin, Texas.
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: Condemns Joseph Stack's attack on the Internal Revenue Service in Austin, Texas. Mourns the loss of Vernon Hunter. Honors the heroic contributions of Robin De Haven. Recognizes all the first responders involved in the rescue effort.

titles.title: Mourning the loss of Vernon Hunter and honoring the service of Robin De Haven and the first responders to the attack on the Internal Revenue Service in Austin, Texas.
